website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer an isosceles bag then this is a good bet. Spacious and easy to carry.
pros: Comfortable padded shoulder straps for easy transportation
Extra internal zippered pock for additional storage
Can typically fit boots and a helmet
cons: Complaints of poor quality, especially for the straps and seams

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 12 year old for ski club. This bag is perfect size to hold: * Boots * Helmet * Gloves, (2 pair) * Hat * Extra shirt * Her ski coat Bonus: * Pouch area for money * Spot for bottled water/snack The bag worked great this season! She is not easy on her gear and this bag looks great now that the season is ending. For the record: boots are shoe size 9, clothing is adult small and her jacket was a North face parka. We will clean it, spray with waterproofing and use it again next year. Well worth it! Great price for the quality
customer_reviews.author: PureLuck

customer_reviews.title: Nice compartments.  Easy to cary as a backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set up of compartments. I like finally keeping my boots in a separate section from everything else. Carefully think about the size you want. I didn't want to go to big as I knew I'd overfill it and have trouble carrying it. However I have a large head and therefore a large helmet. I ended up with one that barely fits my helmet in the middle and boots on the outside. It is the right size for me, but any smaller would not have worked.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good way to teach everyone being responsible too
customer_reviews.text: So organized and balance of weight! We bought 1 to try it out, now we're going to have 1 for each family member. You can fit your ski boots, helmet, pants, socks, thermo light weight clothes, plus snacks and water bottle in this 1 bag! Good way to teach everyone being responsible too.
customer_reviews.author: WLeung

customer_reviews.title: Good overall ski backpack worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had a prior model backpack from the same company with same color which lasted for 10 years before the zippers became jammed and it developed some tears. This model was advertised as extra large. This was not as large as my first backpack plus there are no side pockets. With my current gear I would not have room for a helmet.Previously I carried a helmet,4 neck warmers,2 ski masks.2 ski googles,2 sweaters,boots,3 pair of gloves and some snacks.I carry extra for the Grand kids since they often lose a glove,neck warmer,etc.Overall it is well made and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L. Baucum

customer_reviews.title: Really rugged, and truly waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This is the first trip with this bag. On a small plane, I decided to gate check it because it wouldn’t fit overhead. Big mistake. American Airlines managed to douse it in motor oil, with my ski boots, pants, helmet and more inside. The bag was filthy - covered in smelly oil stains - but everything inside was completely protected. The water resistance is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Reiffsteck

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I need
customer_reviews.text: My first transpack lasted a long time, but one of the shoulder straps began to fray. I replaced it with the same model. It carries a lot of gear, keeps my boots in separate sections, and it's easy to carry on my back. For flying all my ski clothes and gear go in the ski bag and transpack (counts as 1 bag!) so I can go on the plane with a carryon and a computer bag.
customer_reviews.author: RBG

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this pack. I can get all my skiing gear in it and boots included. Makes it easy to carry my stuff to the mountain and back. I had one for many years. Actually when they first came out in the early 2000s and it just now is showing wear and coming apart in the stressed areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot Bag for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It works great for all my ski equipment. While it's not my favorite color, it fits my boots, helmet, and a few extra layers of clothing. I wish it had some more small pockets, but it does it's job and is a pretty good price. I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: everimaginer

customer_reviews.title: Useful backpack style boot bag
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these bags for my son and me, and we are generally very happy with them. It is a lot easier to have a backpack-style boot carrier, and there is room for me to pack helmet/gloves/goggles and even my ski pants in the middle compartment. I subtracted one star because I think there is room for improvement -- tweak the boot compartment size slightly larger. (Maybe I am saying that because my son has big feet!) I'll probably have to look for a larger size for him in a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Owens

customer_reviews.title: Ski bag
customer_reviews.text: This ski bag is great. It's been used hard by my teenage son for two seasons now and is still in good shape. He stuffs a ridiculous amount of ski gear into it (boots, helmet, gloves, googles, ski pants, ski jacket, etc) the backpack feature is perfect for a kid taking the ski bus.
customer_reviews.author: KSW

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Ski Boots or Skates
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these Transpack bags over the years, mostly for transporting inline skates. THey hold up well and are very functional. Plenty of room for skates in the side compartments, plus helmet and pads in the middle compartment. Highly recommended for transporting ski boots or skates.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton DiPierro

customer_reviews.title: Quality boot bag
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for boots, helmet, and gear. Sturdy construction and quality. Love Transpack brand!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!
customer_reviews.text: The sizing provided is very unclear. I ordered a "One Size" in this bag. When it arrived the tag indicated it was a "Jr Edge" so would not fit my husband's boots and barely fit my ten year old daughter's. If the sizing was more clear. I do not think this would be a problem. I am trying again with another Transpack bag, but again could not figure out the sizing so may be going back as well. Annoying!
customer_reviews.author: triple c

customer_reviews.title: I like the bag as it appears well built but to ...
customer_reviews.text: somewhat smaller than I expected. can get my teen daughter's boots and a few essentials (base layer, gloves and squeeze in pants but cannot get her ski helmet in without significant tetris playing. I like the bag as it appears well built but to do it again I would order a larger bag
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Sturdy Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits a lot of stuff- boots (23s) and the inner portion holds helmet, goggles, ski pants and gloves. It does have an inside pocket as well. Has held up well this season.
customer_reviews.author: Mykidsmom

customer_reviews.title: Boot bag worked out great!
customer_reviews.text: Flying with ski gear is a tough deal but the boot bag held all our ski hats, goggles, socks, leggings, gloves, and some snacks as well as the cumbersome ski boots. It isn't padded like my old bag that was stolen but it's lighter in weight so that was a plus. Also, you need to have your ski or snow board boots in a "boot bag" otherwise the airlines will charge you for an extra bag. It's a great bag for the price, we got 2, one for me and my husband. Our friends wanted to know where they could buy them so that speaks for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: This bag was perfect for our son. He was in a school ski program and needed to carry his gear, this fit the need. His boots on the side, helmet, goggles, gloves and a snack in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag. Huge middle pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this bag for anyone in the market for a ski-boot specific bag. The side pockets for the boots are great, with grommets to allow venting. But the middle pocket is what's really great; tons of room for helmet, socks, clothes, ipad, even another pair of shoes. I looked at the more expensive Transpack models, but this one is more than enough space and function.
customer_reviews.author: Marshal W

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the Second trasport boot bag i have purchased This first lasted 15 years
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for carrying my steel-toed work boots
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to carry my PPE for work. It is perfect for carrying my steel-toed work boots, coveralls, hardhat, and safety glasses. It has reduced the clutter in the back of my Explorer and makes it easy to transport my work gear to a changing room. Large boot pockets and center pocket have more than enough room for my gear.
customer_reviews.author: wade daniels

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot bag
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be a nice durable bag. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, my daughter has one and I finally ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, my daughter has one and I finally got one for myself. Carries boots which leaves your hands free for your skis. Center compartment is large enough for other clothing.
customer_reviews.author: John Clowes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far on this ski boot and gear pack. The wide construction makes it fit comfortably on your back. There is plenty of space in the center compartment for a helmet/hat/gloves/goggles and even lunch. A couple of zip pockets on the sides give a few more options. The fabric is waterproof and seems durable enough.
customer_reviews.author: John Q. Public

customer_reviews.title: Makes ski travel easy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, stores boots, pants, googles, and gloves for a recent trip to Utah. Love this product so easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Fits like a backpack should. Holds your boots, helmet and lots of room for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bennett

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bag makes skiing super easy. Whole family has one each. A pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Roomy and good quality for the price. Adult sized boots go on the two side zippers. Goggles, helmet, and gloves fit easily in middle pouch, with room to spare for extra layers. I love the ease of storage inside and always knowing where our gear is. I also recommend the smaller transpack for kids, as that one is also plenty roomy, the right price, and allows children to be independent.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you do not over stuff it it's a legit carry-on. If you over stuff it probably not.
customer_reviews.author: BQ

customer_reviews.title: Good ski bag
customer_reviews.text: We have several of these, and they really come in handy if you own your own ski boots and gear. Put your helmet, gloves, and extra stuff in the center, and one ski boot on each side. Pretty durable, too. We've had a couple for years, and as our son finally grew big enough to need his own, we purchased this one for him. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ample room for all of the gear we need to carry. Helmut and goggles stay safe and secure in the center pouch and with the zipper closures we can check the bag if needed and not worry about it coming open. Could not be more happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dhamp

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Ample room for all of the gear we need to carry. Helmut and goggles stay safe and secure in the center pouch and with the zipper closures we can check the bag if needed and not worry about it coming open. Could not be more happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dhamp

customer_reviews.title: Good, simple bag
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity of this bag. Not a lot of bells and whistles, just does the job. I'm a 6 foot tall guy and the bag fits my boots, two pairs of gloves, mask, helmet and goggles all in a compact footprint. Easy to carry. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag for boots and accessories. Well constructed and fit my boots, helmet and accessories nicely. Backpacking is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: Needs more pockets
customer_reviews.text: Needs more pockets. These guys are charging to much for this bag. It should have more features for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kimmyg

customer_reviews.title: Fine for boots
customer_reviews.text: Fine for boots, helmet and skiing accessories. Not as large as some other brands. (Not able to fit a race suit, for example)
customer_reviews.author: ~LT

customer_reviews.title: Great Ski Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag folded up nicely to fit in suitcase on my way to our ski resort. Was durable and had plenty of room for my ski boots and other items. I have only used it for one ski trip.
customer_reviews.author: Karen_AR

customer_reviews.title: sturdy construct, fabric is very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, sturdy construct, fabric is very high quality, and the pink color is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Liu

customer_reviews.title: A must have for all skiers
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece of ski equipment. It makes those long treks across the parking lot effortless. Prior to owning this backpack, I used an old hockey bag and would arrive at the lift lines winded and with a stiff back. Not anymore. It also stows away easily in the lodge.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H. Bielawa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bags are not big enough to hold all the gear. I prefer the Athalon bags more
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn C. Metzker

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Strong case. Holds everything, boots, helmet, goggles, ski pants, hat, gloves and snacks! Strong zippers and good fabric.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cashman

customer_reviews.title: Great item!!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy saw this out in Vail $25 higher. Well made comfortable to carry and boot bags fly FREE on SW. Fits boots helmet gloves googles SPF ETC.... I was very pleased and its well made. 5 star because I was pleased
customer_reviews.author: beegirl

customer_reviews.title: very nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It fits my boots, helmet, and all the small accessories I need to carry when we go skiing (gloves, hat, scarf, etc). It is sturdy and the material is good quality, easy to clean and very convenient. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: This product seems like a great product
customer_reviews.text: This product seems like a great product. It was a Christmas gift to my Grand Daughter, which she asked for, so the ski season will tell the tale
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Wrong picture / description
customer_reviews.text: This item shows a hunter green bag. It came in teal.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B Hines

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for carrying your ski gear
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything in one spot, making it easy to carry your ski gear
customer_reviews.author: HecTortilla

customer_reviews.title: On first impression it doesn't feel like the most sturdy of bags but it has so ...
customer_reviews.text: On first impression it doesn't feel like the most sturdy of bags but it has so far survived one trip unscathed. My helmet didn't fit in the bag along with my boots but it was easy enough just to strap it to the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: This is the Jr bag which is a bit small, but still holds my size 6 1/2 boots, helmet, gloves, goggles. Only feature I don't like is no padding so it is uncomfortable as a backpack. However, I don't carry it far, just to the check- in when we fly. I tuck my fleece and neck warmer behind the helmet to pad a little. I like the compactness of it for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: fits everything you need plus some. fit two peoples gear (only one set of boots). separate compartment for boots so everything doesn't get wet
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic one (they've got more complex, expensive versions ... my husband has that one!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it; simplifies ski gear from home to slope and back!
customer_reviews.author: Evie H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great, fits a lot of Ski equipment for the Children. Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: NatalieF

customer_reviews.title: Makes life so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot bag. It fits my boots and all my accessories with room to spare. I tried the medium size Transpack Edge bag, but it was too big on my back for someone my size and the extra room was not neccessary. This one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: jungle

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Although I believe the quality has gone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Although I believe the quality has gone down in recent years. Still the go-to ski boot bag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The bag is well designed and constructed. The size and colour are as described. The bag will hold boots and a helmet and gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Fraser

customer_reviews.title: It should grow with her nicely. The powder blue color is very pretty
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! A little more room than she needs right now, age 11. It should grow with her nicely. The powder blue color is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: nh mom

customer_reviews.title: great bag
customer_reviews.text: holds everything you need for skiing without the bulk and frees your hands for your skiis,boots fit great,strong durable product
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ralph G. Bertoni

customer_reviews.title: So Cool
customer_reviews.text: Using for first time today, Perfect design for all the gear and great compartments for the boots. Beside for an old man help add a little coolness to my wardrobe.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way to get my gear to the chalet. No banging of legs, extra free hand, gear balanced on back. There is ample room for boots, gloves, helmet, water, lightweight pants, goggles, and snacks. Who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Walter DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these packs. center storage fits helmet, goggles, gloves and a bit more no problem. Sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Angelo

customer_reviews.title: best brand
customer_reviews.text: love trasnpack bags, had one for years. got this one for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: PSM

customer_reviews.title: It’s very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I liked how much it could hold, and how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Barrio

customer_reviews.title: getting to the slopes
customer_reviews.text: This backpack makes getting to the slopes much easier. My boots, helmet, gloves, food and beverage all fit easily and my hands are free for skis and poles. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. always in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. My 11 year old son has commandeered ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. My 11 year old son has commandeered mine. I think we need to get another one.. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Ira Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag for boots and extra storage thru the day ...
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 3

customer_reviews.title: Ski Schlep
customer_reviews.text: This pack provides a way to keep my ski gear in one location - ready to grab and throw in the trunk along with my skis and poles. It makes the schlep from the parking lot to the lodge almost effortless.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dog Blue

customer_reviews.title: finally nice to have the kids tote their own
customer_reviews.text: Works awesoe, finally nice to have the kids tote their own gear
customer_reviews.author: rea

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.text: This a great bag It holds boots and all the kids' gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and good ski boot and helmet bag
customer_reviews.author: EJS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits gear for going to ski club, boots, helmet, ski pants, gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Scott N.

customer_reviews.title: It is great the only thing I would ask for is that ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great the only thing I would ask for is that I have a little bit more room to put your lunch too
customer_reviews.author: Virginia H. Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful. It was gift and they loved it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. It was gift and they loved it. Great color!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Ciccone

customer_reviews.title: boots and most other stuff
customer_reviews.text: It carries boots, helmet, gloves and enough other stuff to make it through the day. Seems to be tough, too.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids. For an adult it may be a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for skiiers
customer_reviews.text: Great bag-holds boots, helmet, goggles and still room for water, gloves, hat etc. Must have for skiiers who want to make the carrying part of the day easier.
customer_reviews.author: ADP

customer_reviews.title: a much needed gift the bag is super nice.
customer_reviews.text: a much needed gift the bag is super nice ...
customer_reviews.author: mary jane

customer_reviews.title: Transpack Ski boot bag - very roomy
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds the boots, helmet and other accessories. Seems very sturdy. Easy to carrry back and forth from home to the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S Marin

customer_reviews.title: Great for any size ski boots
customer_reviews.text: Can fit virtually everything you need for skiing - boots, helmet, gloves, hat, etc.- including food for a day. Great quality. My 13 year old loves it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Boot Gear Bag Review
customer_reviews.text: I like the boot bag. Plenty of room for helmet, boots and gear. The boot compartments could be a little larger, but they work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could use a little more room in the helmet compartment. I wear a 11.5 US shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Held boots
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Held boots, helmet and every piece gear and ski clothing I needed to bring. Everything but the skis.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth s.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big fit both of my size 11 boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big fit both of my size 11 boots and helmet no problem with room for hats gloves etc. great price as well saw them up to 100 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits boots helmet gloves bibs. Straps to your back. Does everything I want from a bootbag
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Nordic ski
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a Nordic high school skier. This pack fits both her classic and skate boots. There is plenty of room in the center section for clothing, water and snacks.
customer_reviews.author: DcS

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our son is on ski team and Its perfect fits boots helment gloves and extra clothes and his lunch easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: sandra underwood

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this for one ski season, but it easily fits my boots, helmet, snowpants, hats/mittens, etc. Plenty of space in one handy bag.
customer_reviews.author: ecm

customer_reviews.title: Great bags. I bought three
customer_reviews.text: Great bags. I bought three. My family loves them and the customer service could not have been better. The Ski Monster even upgraded us to a nicer, bigger bag at no additional cost!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Lederer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot pack
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a boot bag for my wife that wasn't too bulky but had enough space for gloves and helmet and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander T. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: The boot and gear bag is perfect! Allows for free hands to carry skis and has extra room in the main compartment for helmet, ski pants etc. I'll be buying one for everyone in the family!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for son to take his gear for ski lessons from school. Along with Skiweb ski carrier, this bag works really well for his helmet + snowpants/gloves + boots.
customer_reviews.author: wiz

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag, Does the job, Holds my boots and my big headed helmet just great. I just bought one for my wife and we just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kboy24

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Lots of room for boots
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Lots of room for boots, helmet & other gear.
customer_reviews.author: Libby Yoskowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag good quality. I bought 10 for each of my grandkids that ski with me so that they can manage all thier own gear. I look to these bags lasting a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Boot Bag
customer_reviews.text: this bag is designed perfectly, ski boots, helmets gloves and everything else. i used it for a trip with my daughters and had 3 helmets gloves hats etc.. in it with no problem. my only critique is that there is no padding in the back of the bag so it can be tough on your back if you you don't pack it right.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: Great ski bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old bought the bag with his birthday money and loves it. It is roomy and fits all his ski gear together. We highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: May  Moy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned and got a different style.. this was awkward to carry
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: ... have the pockets or space my other transpaks do- disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the pockets or space my other transpaks do- disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: D Porter

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I had thought it would be, but it suits its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and has loads of room! It is very durable. The description is accurate. I'm a happy, happy skier!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Key

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new boot bag and was happy with what I got
customer_reviews.author: Richard Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Overall great boot bag, definitely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Tons of room for boots, goggles, helmet, and some extra gear. Loved that it is also a backpack so it's very easy to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: David Finn

customer_reviews.title: Well-built and large capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Adequately sized to fit boots up to size 14.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lindbeck

product_meta.title: Transpack Edge Isosceles Ski Boot Bag
product_meta.description: Lightweight and rugged, the Transpack Edge Isosceles ski boot bag will get your boots and gear to the mountain through all types of weather conditions. It has adjustable, neoprene-padded shoulder straps and an internal zippered pocket.
